constructor.name: ArrowDecorator

functions.name: paint
functions.description:
Draw a filled arrow decoration. It's not your work to rotate the arrow. The draw2d do this job for you.

                      ---+ [length , width/2]
               -------   |
[3,0]   --------          |
   +---                  |==========================
       --------          |
               -------   |
                      ---+ [lenght ,-width/2]

parameters.name: paper
parameters.description: the raphael paper object for the paint operation

constructor.name: BarDecorator

parameters.name: paper
parameters.description: the raphael paper object for the paint operation

constructor.name: CircleDecorator

parameters.name: paper
parameters.description: the raphael paper object for the paint operation

functions.name: paint
functions.description:
Paint the decoration for a connector. The Connector starts always in [0,0] and ends in [x,0]. It is not necessary to consider any rotation of the connection. This will be done by the framework.

              | -Y
              |
              |
 --------------+-----------------------------> +X
              |
              |
              |
              V +Y

See in ArrowConnectionDecorator for example implementation.

functions.name: setColor
functions.description: Set the stroke color for the decoration

functions.name: setBackgroundColor
functions.description: Set the background color for the decoration

functions.name: setDimension
functions.description: Change the dimension of the decoration shape

constructor.name: DiamondDecorator

functions.name: paint
functions.description:
Draw a filled diamond decoration.

It's not your work to rotate the arrow. The draw2d do this job for you.

parameters.name: paper
parameters.description: the raphael paper object for the paint operation
